thread.title: CustomerJohn S Russell
thread.title_full: AmericanFlags.com reviewed by CustomerJohn S Russell

author: CustomerJohn S Russell
title: CustomerJohn S Russell
text: In the past 2 years I have ordered 2 American flags and within 6 weeks I have had to take them both to a tailor and pay to have them stiched up. When I called customer serv. they told me it was due to the flag waving in the breeze. Cheat me once my fault, cheat me twice never again. I really believe in supporting made in America goods and services but this company is making me find another source. Too bad.
